extendedInfo.description: New year, new you! Paleo Diet provides hundreds of low carb recipes to help you burn fat and live healthier. âââââââââââââââââââââââ "These recipes are so good. Recommend it to anyone trying paleoâ¦" - Christina Xirou"This is helping me so much!" - Andrea Ward "I am really enjoy this app! It is extremely helpful for my diet! Truly thanks!" - Nam Ngoâââââââââââââââââââââââ The only thing that matters when it comes to losing weight is if it works!First popularized in the mid-1970s, the paleo diet has been promoted by a huge number of authors and researchers in books and academic journals as a method of healthy eating. The paleo diet, also popularly referred to as the caveman diet, Stone Age diet and hunter-gatherer diet, is a nutritional plan based on eating wild plants and animals.Paleolithic nutrition is based on the premise that modern humans are genetically adapted to the diet of their Paleolithic ancestors and that human genetics have scarcely changed since the dawn of agriculture. Therefore, an ideal diet for human health is one that resembles this ancestral diet. Research has shown that modern human populations following paleo like diets are largely free of diseases of affluence, such as diabetes and heart disease. The "modern" Paleolithic diet consists mainly of healthy proteins, including: fish, grass-fed pasture raised meats, vegetables, fruit, roots, and nuts.â Features an elegant and intuitive interface â Over 300 paleo food recipes â Recipes for all meal types including: breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack â Star your favorites for easy reference â Filter menu to sort â Search feature to quickly find your favorite recipe Download the Paleo Diet app and start eating healthier today!

reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A PALEO RECIPE APP
reviews.comment: Since when did cave people enjoy a bar of chocolate? Chocolate and butter are just two ingredients which don\'t belong in a Paleo diet. Anybody who wants to do a cheat paleo diet, this is the app for you.
reviews.author: Yvonne Evans

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Can\'t get to recipe details on my Android phone. Developer support was responsive but had no solution.
reviews.author: John Penrice

reviews.title: looks cool
reviews.comment: Scrolling works well, but then the app stops working when I try and search it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I use this everyday and my family loves my cooking now. Its so easy to read and find recipes that are great for you.
reviews.author: Kayla Kruse

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I have had 5 -6 meals so far and all have been great. The meatloaf has been the best so far.
reviews.author: Brian Burgess

reviews.title: Paleo
reviews.comment: Excellent recipes but it keeps erasing my favorites stars.  There\'s also no easy way to search through your favorite recipes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Lots of great recipes and easy to follow, would be perfect if they were organized into breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert
reviews.author: Cody Tustin

reviews.title: Great Menu Planning Tool
reviews.comment: I\'d tried the Paleo Diet years ago, but there wasn\'t much around by way of recipes.  When I discovered this, it was an answer to prayer.  I\'ve developed food allergies and sensitivities that make it nearly impossible for me to eat anything in the PD banned food groups anyway.  Seemed a no brainer to return to the PD and what a relief to find such a wide range of recipes, most of which are fairly simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice but needs some tweaking
reviews.comment: would be nice to have a way to sort or arrange your favorites or even have the ability to add your own changes to the recipes and to share those changes with other people who own this app like a collaboration!
reviews.author: j\303\264\303\221\303\203TH\303\242\303\261 z\303\255gM\303\242\303\221T

reviews.title: Good recipes so far.
reviews.comment: Still trying to figure it out,  but so far the recipes are delicious!
reviews.author: Giselle Facemire

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Now they just need to update an easier way to look at your favorite dishes once you have selected them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Learning how to cook clean
reviews.author: Jorge Yanez

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: The recipes look fairly easy and tasty, but categories would be helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good selection
reviews.comment: Recipe for every occasion. Collection from the common folk, not professional chefs.
reviews.author: Don Seeley

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Easy to use and navigate. Great recipes
reviews.author: Jennifer Stevens

reviews.comment: Instructions are clear, and there are a lot of recipes. This is the best paleo app I have found so far
reviews.author: Brian Mear

reviews.title: Wish I hasn\'t spent money on it
reviews.comment: The app isn\'t bad but there aren\'t enough recipes and it\'s not worth the money you pay for it. If it were free or had a few thousand extra recipes I\'d give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Courtney Foster

reviews.title: Great recipes
reviews.comment: Great recipes, I just wish they were categorized.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Makes going Paleo easy.
reviews.author: KC Rudder

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Interesting new ideas!
reviews.author: Amber Sedell
